meanings.sent1: The brave knight dethrones the evil king.
meanings.sent2: The people's vote dethrones the corrupt leader.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel dethrones the reigning bird feeder champion.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, the pawn dethrones the queen with a clever move.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected plot twist dethrones the main character from their position of power.

meanings.definition: Remove from a position of dominance or superiority.
meanings.sent1: The underdog team dethrones the reigning champions in a thrilling match.
meanings.sent2: The new technology dethrones the old one with its innovative features.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel dethrones the confident cat from its favorite napping spot.
meanings.sent4: The rising star dethrones the established actor with a breakthrough performance.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected discovery dethrones the current theory, shaking the scientific community.
